thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 16 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Canada works with provinces to ensure liquor sales policies consistent with trade commitments -Trade Minister's Spokesman

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Canada works with provinces to ensure liquor sales policies consistent with trade commitments -Trade Minister's Spokesman
text:
Jan 16 (Reuters) -
* CANADA WORKS CLOSELY WITH PROVINCES TO ENSURE LIQUOR DISTRIBUTION, SALES POLICIES CONSISTENT WITH INTERNATIONAL TRADE COMMITMENTS -TRADE MINISTER‘S SPOKESMAN
* CANADA WILL “CONTINUE TO GIVE CAREFUL CONSIDERATION TO A REQUEST FOR CONSULTATIONS FROM ANY WTO MEMBER” -TRADE MINISTER‘S SPOKESMAN Further company coverage: (Reporting By Leah Schnurr)
